text: Mario Tontodonati (August 31, 1923 in Scafa - June 24, 2009http://www.quinews.it/2009/06/24/calcio-e-morto-testina-doro-tontodonati/ in Fontecchio) was an Italian professional football player. He played for 7 seasons (206 games, 51 goals) in the Serie A for A.S. Bari, A.S. Roma, A.S. Lucchese Libertas 1905 and A.C. Torino. ==References== ==External links== Category:1923 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Delfino Pescara 1936 players Category:S.S.C. title: Mario Tontodonati
